Lestat de Lioncourt.Action: Responds to a powerful, captivating music, emerging from a tomb and moving purposefully toward the sound despite physical strain and unnatural movements.
Avoids detection by moving through shadows and away from street lamps, exercising caution in a potentially dangerous environment.

Attacks and kills the dealer violently without hesitation.
Feels revitalized and alive, appreciating music and life.
Efficiently attacks and incapacitates the dealer with a sudden, controlled frenzy to feed and rejuvenate himself.
After feeding, demonstrates heightened sensory awareness by precisely locating the source of music.

Laughs out loud with pure pleasure at his own situation.
